game.name: Toilet 8
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 끝없는 화장실에 갇혔습니다. 모든 칸을 주의 깊게 보세요. 이상하면 돌아가세요. 평범해 보인다면… 절대 뒤돌아보지 마세요. 그렇지 않으면 지옥의 방귀를 맞게 됩니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You’re trapped in endless toilets. Watch these stalls carefully, every detail counts. If something’s wrong, turn back. If not… don’t you dare look behind. Or face the fart from hell.
